channel.title: Illinois State Water Survey (ISWS) Calendar of Events
channel.description: Illinois State Water Survey events, conferences, speakers, and more.

item.title: Prairie Research Institute All-Staff Golf Outing
item.description: This is a volunteer-led event and not an official Institute function, so annual leave must be taken. See the attached flyer for additional details and registration.

item.title: 15th Biennial Governor's Conference on the Management of the Illinois River System
item.description: 15th Biennial Governor's Conference on the Management of the Illinois River System - our speaker's hearts are never far from water and will share knowledge of past, present, and future watershed partnerships.
